x_symbol.description: This is an unobtrusive table enhancement. It freezes the table's first row (or THEAD) and first column while the rest of the table is scrollable. If the table has a CAPTION it is removed and inserted above the frozen header.
x_symbol.syntax: new xTable(sTableId, sRoot, sCC, sFR, sFRI, sRCell, sFC, sFCI, sCCell, sTC, sCellT)

par.name: sTableId
par.note: The original table's ID or Element object reference.

par.name: sFRI
par.note: Classname for the frozen-row inner container, for column headings.

par.name: sRCell
par.note: Classname for each fr cell (column heading) container.

par.name: sFCI
par.note: Classname for the frozen-column inner container, for row headings.

par.name: sCCell
par.note: Classname for each fc cell (row heading) container.

par.name: sCellT
par.note: Classname for the table in each fr or fc cell.

comment.author: mf
comment.note: Refer to the demo for usage.
